Run differential analysis on all screens

Source: R/facades.R
analyze_screens.Rd

Runs DESeq2-based differential analysis on all targetons in the prepared count matrices.

Usage

analyze_screens(
  complete_matrices,
  normalisation_matrices,
  metadata,
  condition_levels = c("Day4", "Day7", "Day10", "Day15"),
  ...
)

Arguments

complete_matrices

List of count matrices from prepare_count_matrices().

normalisation_matrices

List of normalization matrices from prepare_count_matrices().

metadata

Sample metadata data frame, or an SGEData object from which the metadata will be extracted.

condition_levels

Character vector of condition factor levels (default: c("Day4", "Day7", "Day10", "Day15")).

...

Additional arguments passed to run_differential_analysis().

Value

A list containing:

deseq_results

List of SGEResults objects by targeton

contrast_tables

Combined contrast table for all targetons

rlog_results

List of rlog-transformed data by targeton

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Using SGEData object
results <- analyze_screens(
  complete_matrices = matrices$complete_matrices,
  normalisation_matrices = matrices$normalisation_matrices,
  metadata = sge_data
)

# Using metadata data frame directly
results <- analyze_screens(
  complete_matrices = matrices$complete_matrices,
  normalisation_matrices = matrices$normalisation_matrices,
  metadata = metadata_df
)
} # }
